Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Washington in 2011...
Traded from Washington to Arizona on 2/16/2011 (Going to WSH: C R. Harris. Going to ARI: P T. Bauer, P C. Stokley, P B. Kersey)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/2013...
Had first career hit (triple) on 5/11/2013, off Ryan Drese (COL)...
Struck out 15 batters against San Diego on 4/15/2014...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/2017, off Miguel Gonzalez (CHN)...
Injured on 6/30/2019 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Injured on 7/17/2020 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
